title: Riot and their broken Ranked system
body:
hey guys, i would like to know why i keep getting put against smurf's when their MMR is higher than mine in ranked? Why when i lose a game i lose more than i win? Why when i had 12 LP and i loss 9LP why did all my LP disappear?

Rito PLz fix this
P.S. Why u gotta make the game towards the korean/chinese servers? Why to ONLY the top percentage? It would be more market-ably strategical to patch towards your higher amount of clients/customers/fans. Riot why u do dis?

replies.body: happened to me last night, although not quite smurfs, its was 1am and ranked queues slow down so me (silver 1) got placed with plats, and it was a horrible experience when it came to losing 19+ lp
